Plot: Filmed in 3D for IMAX and Giant Screen cinemas, JERUSALEM is an immersive experience about one of the world's most beloved cities. Discover why this tiny piece of land is sacred to billions...
Title: Jerusalem
Writer: Daniel Ferguson, Sheila Curran Bernard (contributing writer)
Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Jodi Magness, Farah Ammouri, Austin Carder
